thread.section_title: Fabihno speaks out amid Manchester United transfer speculation – Metro
thread.title: Fabihno speaks out amid Manchester United transfer speculation
thread.title_full: Fabihno speaks out amid Manchester United transfer speculation

author: Tom Olver
title: Fabihno speaks out amid Manchester United transfer speculation
text:
Fabinho is being heavily linked with Manchester United (Picture: Getty) Manchester United target Fabinho has spoken out amid speculation he’s set for a move to Old Trafford in the summer transfer window.
Arsene Wenger report card: Time to go after dragging Arsenal to all-time low of his reign Fabinho admitted last month that he dreams of playing for a club of United’s stature and the 23-year-old full-back is expected to move on from Monaco at the end of the season.
However, the Brazilian, who is also on Arsenal’s radar, has stated that he will ‘wait and see what happens’ after a brilliant season for Monaco domestically and in the Champions League.
‘Certainly, numerous offers will arrive for several players, even though we are very young,’ Fabinho said.
Jose Mourinho is tracking the Monaco defender (Picture: Getty) ‘We have five players in the French national team, it is incredible. I have not yet been contacted by clubs, I do not like to think about that too much, because the window only begins in June and we are still in the running for four competitions.”
‘My contract runs until 2021 and I do not know what the plans of the board are for next season.
More: Football Chelsea transfer target sends message to Conte with class ball for last-gasp Lukaku goal 
Belgium star Dries Mertens booked for pinching Greek player's nose... twice 
Arsenal star reveals the decision that caused him to question Wenger this season 
‘If they are looking to keep the team together, if they are looking to sign reinforcements, if they are looking to sell… We will wait and see what happens.’
MORE: Marcus Rashford ready to anger Jose Mourinho with major decision
